author: senh
title: In Hope of Spotting a Leopard
text: BING NEWS: In Hope of Spotting a Leopard We were on the hunt for leopards in Sri Lanka. In some ways, it seems like an easy task in Yala National Park, a 979-square-kilometer (378-square-mile) expanse abutting the Indian Ocean in the island’s southeast.
